notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: E.B., A.Y.S., S.K. and S.S. conceived the project. E.B., A.Y.S. and S.K. designed experiments. E.B., N.S., K.K., A.T.N., M.P.Y., R.S., K.M.V., A.M., A.E.N., J.A.R.N., M.X.S. and J.V.C. performed experiments. E.B., A.T.N., M.P.Y., A.M., K.V., A.Y.S. and H.Q. performed quality control data screening. E.B. and A.T.N. performed the data analysis. T.C. and K.K. led the development and execution of ZIKV-IG characterization assays. H.S. performed the statistical analyses. E.B., A.Y.S. and K.K. wrote the manuscript. H.Q., D.B., S.K. and S.S. edited the manuscript.
